title: The Latest On Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 From Ukraine
teaser: Filip Warwick, a freelance photojournalist who’s been at the crash site, joins us.
contentencoded:
We get the latest from the Malaysian Airlines crash site in Ukraine, and how the investigation is going.

Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson talks to Filip Warwick, a freelance photojournalist who’s been at the crash site.

Guest

  • Filip Warwick, freelance photojournalist. He tweets @filipwarwick.
